refsect2.title: plink
refsect2.para:
varchar
name of the partner link

refsect2.title: opt
refsect2.para:
varchar
name of the options to be retrieved

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The function returns a string or array of strings depending of the requested option.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
BPEL.BPEL.plink_get_option
This function can be used to retrieve the options assigned to a particular partner link. These options are used to configure various Web Service protocols (see Protocol Support section in BPEL reference chapter).
For available options see plink_set_option()
function.

example.title: Simple example
example.screen:
SQL> select BPEL.BPEL.plink_get_option ('WSSecho', 'service', 'wss-in-encrypt'); callret VARCHAR _______________________________________________________________________________
NONE
